qmt.data package¶

Submodules¶

qmt.data.data_utils module¶

Utility functions for dealing with data.

qmt.data.data_utils.serialised_file(path)[source]¶

Return a serialised blob of the contents of a given file path.

qmt.data.data_utils.write_deserialised(serial_obj, path)[source]¶

Write a deserialised file from a serialised blob to a given file path.

qmt.data.data_utils.store_serial(obj, save_fct, ext_format, scratch_dir=None)[source]¶

Return a serialised representation of save_fct(obj, scratch_dir/temporary_file.ext_format). The temporary file has a unique name. The parameter ext_format can be used for format distinction in some save_fct.

qmt.data.data_utils.load_serial(serial_obj, load_fct, ext_format=None, scratch_dir=None)[source]¶

Return the original object stored with store_serial. The load_fct must be a correct complement of the previously used store_fct.

qmt.data.geo_data module¶

Geometry data classes.

class qmt.data.geo_data.GeoData[source]¶

Bases: qmt.data.template.Data

class qmt.data.geo_data.Geo1DData[source]¶

Bases: qmt.data.template.Data

Class holding 1D geometry data.

add_part(part_name, start_point, end_point, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Add a part to this geometry. :param str part_name: Name of the part to create :param float start_point: Position of the start of the part :param float end_point: Position of the end of the part :param bool overwrite: Should we allow this to overwrite?

remove_part(part_name, ignore_if_absent=False)[source]¶

Remove a part from this geometry. :param str part_name: Name of part to remove :param bool ignore_if_absent: Should we ignore an attempted removal if the part name is not found?

class qmt.data.geo_data.Geo2DData[source]¶

Bases: qmt.data.template.Data

Class holding 2D geometry data.

add_part(part_name, part, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Add a part to this geometry. :param str part_name: Name of the part to create :param Polygon part: Polygon object from shapely.geometry. This must be a valid Polygon. :param bool overwrite: Should we allow this to overwrite?

remove_part(part_name, ignore_if_absent=False)[source]¶

Remove a part from this geometry. :param str part_name: Name of part to remove :param bool ignore_if_absent: Should we ignore an attempted removal if the part name is not found?

add_edge(edge_name, edge, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Add an edge to this geometry. :param str edge_name: Name of the edge to create :param LineString edge: LineString object from shapely.geometry. :param bool overwrite: Should we allow this to overwrite?

remove_edge(edge_name, ignore_if_absent=False)[source]¶

Remove an edge from this geometry. :param str edge_name: Name of part to remove :param bool ignore_if_absent: Should we ignore an attempted removal if the part name is not found?

get_material_mapping()[source]¶

Get mapping of part names to materials. :return:

add_part(part_name, part, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Add a part to this geometry. :param str part_name: Name of the part to create :param Part3D part: Part3D object. :param bool overwrite: Should we allow this to overwrite?

remove_part(part_name, ignore_if_absent=False)[source]¶

Remove a part from this geometry. :param str part_name: Name of part to remove :param bool ignore_if_absent: Should we ignore an attempted removal if the part name is not found?

set_data(data_name, data, scratch_dir=None)[source]¶

Set data to a serial format that is easily portable. :param str data_name: “fcdoc” freeCAD document “mesh” fenics mesh “rmf” fenics region marker function :param data: The corresponding data that we would like to set. :param scratch_dir: Optional existing temporary (fast) storage location.

get_data(data_name, mesh=None, scratch_dir=None)[source]¶

Get data from stored serial format. :param str data_name: “fcdoc” freeCAD document “mesh” fenics mesh “rmf” fenics region marker function :param mesh: :param scratch_dir: Optional existing temporary (fast) storage location. :return data: The freeCAD document or fenics object that was stored.

write_fcstd(file_path=None)[source]¶

Write geometry to a fcstd file.

Returns the fcstd file path.

qmt.data.template module¶

class qmt.data.template.Data[source]¶

Bases: object

save(azure_info=None, file_path=None)[source]¶

Save the data to Azure or disk. Azure takes precedence over local disk if specified. :param azure_info: Key information for Azure store :param file_path: File path for an hdf5 file in local storage.

load(azure_info=None, file_path=None)[source]¶

Load the data from Azure or disk. Azure takes precedence over local disk if specified. :param azure_info: Key information for Azure store :param file_path: File path for an hdf5 file in local storage.
